alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Willamette Valley; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 13 at 9:57PM PST until November 14 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST MONDAY BELOW 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Visibility less than a quarter of a mile at times in dense fog. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon, Central Willamette Valley, South Willamette Valley, Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Remember to drive slower and use extra care and courtesy on the commute to work Monday morning. Watch for pedestrians in and around school zones Monday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. If you are a pedestrian, wear reflective clothing or use a flashlight to make yourself visible to motorists.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Willamette Valley; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; South Willamette Valley
